GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v6.0.10
GSD.description:
kcm: avoid potential race in kcm_tx_work

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.10 by commit 2526ac6b0f5a9b38e7e9073e37141cf78408078d, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit ab7ac4eb9832e32a09f4e8042705484d2fb0aad3. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: kcm: avoid potential race in kcm_tx_work
